title: What do we do with 6 348 unclaimed $SALTY from the community airdrop?
body:
On February 15th, 2021 a total of 23 322 $SALTY were sent to a token claims contract to be claimed by 169 early SaltDAO members who registered for the community airdrop. Each eligible member was allocated 138 $SALTY, enough for two Pink Salt memberships (costing 69 $SALTY each).

The cut-off for claiming these tokens was March 26th, 2021. As of the cut-off date, there are 6 348 $SALTY tokens which are left unclaimed.

The objective for this governance proposal is to determine what should happen with the 6 348 unclaimed $SALTY.

### Option 1 - Burn $SALTY:

Option 1 is to burn the unclaimed tokens, reducing the supply of $SALTY from 690 000 to 683 652.

### Option 2 - Re-Distribute $SALTY:

Option 2 is to equally redistribute the unclaimed tokens to the buyers of the Genesis Season once the Season is complete.

Governance Proposal Link: https://www.notion.so/saltandsatoshi/2021-03-31-Unclaimed-Community-SALTY-f8ca3f6960f34212a131bbe77b0b5f8b
author: 0xd362db73b59A824558fFeBDFC83073F9E364dbc6
